update com_release_job
com_id = #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

com_release_job_name = #{comReleaseJobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where com_release_job_id = #{comReleaseJobId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update com_release_job set com_id = #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, com_release_job_type = #{comReleaseJobType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_release_job_name = #{comReleaseJobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_release_job_depart = #{comReleaseJobDepart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_release_job_prop = #{comReleaseJobProp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_release_job_salary_low = #{comReleaseJobSalaryLow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, com_release_job_salary_high = #{comReleaseJobSalaryHigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, com_release_job_city = #{comReleaseJobCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_release_job_exp = #{comReleaseJobExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_release_job_requir = #{comReleaseJobRequir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_release_job_temp = #{comReleaseJobTemp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_release_job_describe = #{comReleaseJobDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_release_job_addr = #{comReleaseJobAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_release_job_email = #{comReleaseJobEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_release_job_time = #{comReleaseJobTime,jdbcType=DATE}, com_release_job_update_time = #{comReleaseJobUpdateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, com_release_job_status = #{comReleaseJobStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, com_release_job_resume_prepare_a = #{comReleaseJobResumePrepareA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_release_job_resume_prepare_b = #{comReleaseJobResumePrepareB,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where com_release_job_id = #{comReleaseJobId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT com_name AS comName,com_release_job_name AS comJobName, com_release_job_city AS comCity,com_release_job_salary_low AS comSalaryLow,com_release_job_salary_high AS comSalaryHigh, com_release_job_exp AS comJobExp, com_release_job_requir AS comJobRequir,com_release_job_temp AS comJobTemp,com_release_job_time AS comJobTime, com_field AS comField,com_founder_name AS comFounderName,com_deplo AS comDeplo,com_scale AS comScale FROM com_message AS s1,com_create_team AS s2,com_release_job AS s3 where s1.com_id = s2.com_id and s2.com_id = s3.com_id ORDER By com_release_job_salary_high DESC Limit 0,6

SELECT com_name AS comName,com_release_job_name AS comJobName, com_release_job_city AS comCity,com_release_job_salary_low AS comSalaryLow,com_release_job_salary_high AS comSalaryHigh, com_release_job_exp AS comJobExp, com_release_job_requir AS comJobRequir,com_release_job_temp AS comJobTemp,com_release_job_time AS comJobTime, com_field AS comField,com_founder_name AS comFounderName,com_deplo AS comDeplo,com_scale AS comScale FROM com_message AS s1,com_create_team AS s2,com_release_job AS s3 where s1.com_id = s2.com_id and s2.com_id = s3.com_id ORDER By com_release_job_time DESC limit 0,6

select com_release_job_id, com_id,com_release_job_name,com_release_job_prop,com_release_job_salary_low,com_release_job_salary_high,com_release_job_city,com_release_job_time, com_release_job_exp,com_release_job_requir from com_release_job where com_id = #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND com_release_job_status=#{comReleaseJobStatus}
